actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-839.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 5813) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 5813 (Department of Transportation and related agencies appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 5813) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, and for other purposes.
